Reviews.Title: “The little extras make it special”
Reviews.Author: renette k
Reviews.Content: sceptical positive reviews tripadvisor husband stayed 4 nights october enjoyed stay amazing comfortable bigger expected view rome agree bathroom little bit style function light apply makeup shave husband shower design meant slight leaks floor happy hour free coffees day free laptop set wifi handy advice dine thanks paul porto ripetta restaurant rate thoroughly recommend

Reviews.Title: “Terrific location, comfortable room”
Reviews.Author: sunshinelollypops
Reviews.Content: family 4 stayed 2 nights hotel terrific location 3rd floor building via del corso close proximity main sights clean nicely decorated consisted queen size bed set bunk beds suggest top bunk bed railing top safety balcony didnt nice view street shower run hot water night short wait arrived 3rd floor half party time lift carted bags 2 sets stairs told building drag bottom building stairs stated buzzed seen tv monitors apart annoying staff fabulous restaurant recommendation dinner dining night staff booked transfer airport private car clean fast

Reviews.Content: read reviews days journey disappointed changing reservation mistake friends stayed days location hotel ideal entrance third floor didn’t trouble arrival giuseppe friendly provided maps useful information stuff helpful clean reasonably priced location

Reviews.Title: “Not Anymore....”
Reviews.Author: FreeFlayer
Reviews.Content: hotels rome bad expensive hotel worst value money little 10 square meters bed uncomfortable window closed properly arrived bathroom cleaned reception pay 2 euros day person en extra tax reported voucher 140 euros day breakfast expected

Reviews.Content: hotel sleep wont luxurious lobby gourmet restaurant neither clean comfortable staff friendly helpful air conditioning price extremely reasonable historical centre rome kingsized bed bathroom restaurant youre steps bars restaurants morning found nice little bar corner bar della hotel quickly regulars breakfast walked rome easily hotels central location luxurious hotel nice treat decided wed spend money fabulous dinners souvenirs hotel extras stay
